function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inequitable access to online learning resources for lower income individuals, exacerbating educational disparities","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of respiratory pandemics like covid-19 in urban settings","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration of health and wellbeing dimensions in urban planning","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission within and between cities and city regions","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in fitting broad urban planning and design concepts into systematic review approaches for npis in pandemics","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate urban planning for infectious disease containment","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in office and residential buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate urban design for open public spaces","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases in urban settings due to population density","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequities faced by different social groups in urban settings","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear relationship between population density and infectious disease transmission","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of density and npis on infection rates","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High density residential areas linked to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 due to air pollution-to-human transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for prolonged virus survival in sewer lines due to temperature changes","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seasonal weather conditions influencing the persistence of sars-cov-2 in sewer systems","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of wastewater sampling in reflecting the health status of the population","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate detection limit and precision of quantitative data","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Logistical challenges and costs of wbe approach","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large sample volumes and effective concentration of virus particles may lower method detection limits.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in obtaining data on the infectivity of sewage-borne sars-cov-2.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate representation of coronavirus infectious diseases in cido","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Infection with sars-cov-2 leading to the development of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overload of hospitals and quarantine facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of good sunlight and air flow in building design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleanliness and surface contamination","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient home designs for covid-19 treatment and prevention","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in artificial environments","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and air circulation in homes","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation facilities in homes","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of infectious disease transmission in built environments due to changes in living style and architecture.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of isolation room for infected individuals","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation facilities for preventing virus transmission","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adaptability and flexibility in house design","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Choice of interior design facilitating the spread of the virus and virus retention on surfaces.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality leading to increased risk of disease infection.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exterior and outdoor spaces becoming essential due to the pandemic, leading to potential overcrowding and virus transmission.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of local products and minimal energy consumption in housing may lead to compromised indoor air quality and ventilation, creating a conducive environment for disease transmission","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viruses spreading in built environments","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor spaces leading to the spread of covid-19","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor hygiene and sanitization practices in shared environments","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate queuing space outside shops and public facilities","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient traffic flow and access control in urban areas","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social interactions in green spaces and rooftop amenities may lead to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate planning and design of public spaces may lead to high social density, crowding, and increased public health risks.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of green spaces could lead to increased public health risks and a lack of access to outdoor areas for physical activity and mental well-being.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporary use of green spaces for hospitals","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporary road closures and changes to urban infrastructure","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in noise and air pollution during lockdown","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through shared transportation modes","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"}]}
